title: Gear S2 - Watch Face

description: A simple, vibrant and clean watch face with 10 customizable colors.NOTE: Hit 'Resync app' on Android Wear App after installing. This face may not appear in your watch right after installing. It may take a bit of time to make its way to your watch.If you experienced a problem or have any suggestions, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer.This watch face is only compatible with smart watches running on Android Wear like Moto 360, LG G Watch R etc.
descriptionHTML:
A simple, vibrant and clean watch face with 10 customizable colors.

NOTE: Hit 'Resync app' on Android Wear App after installing. This face may not appear in your watch right after installing. It may take a bit of time to make its way to your watch.

If you experienced a problem or have any suggestions, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer.

This watch face is only compatible with smart watches running on Android Wear like Moto 360, LG G Watch R etc.
comments: Do not buy this crap Totaly waste of money, it just says installed, but no icon on the screen to open the app.
The second hand needs to be smooth. The real Gear S2 watchface looks better simply because of that. Once it's added, it'll be just about perfect.
Brilliant Showed up in less than 1 minute on my Moto360 looks awesome thanx
Not able to access How does I access this in my watch or phone?
How to use this app? Plz tell
